name: Everallin
desc: A Melusine who is part of the Maison Gardiennage. Due to her extraordinary talent of sensing changes in the ocean's movements, she has been stationed in Romaritime Harbor to help observe the ocean and report of any oncoming storms or showers.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
Taking out a deck of Eremite cards, the Melusine Garde begins to demonstrate the stories she's heard through the medium of Genius Invokation TCG. In the desert opposite Romaritime Harbor, protecting your goods from the covetous hands of brazen mercenaries is a complex art, and one deserving of careful study...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule — Ley Line Monolith: Frontline Fulcrum — Grants 20 points of Endurance to withstand harm for your characters. Should this card be removed, you will lose the match.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Eremite Scorching Loremaster
customize.desc:
"Poetry and Secret Histories" Eremite Scorching Loremaster

Those who still remember will never betray the spirit of the sands yet flowing through their veins.

customize.name: Eremite Scorching Loremaster
customize.desc:
"Poetry and Secret Histories" Eremite Scorching Loremaster

Those who still remember will never betray the spirit of the sands yet flowing through their veins.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

value.name: Beryl Conch
value.desc: A conch-like structure that gives off a faint glow. Despite the name, it is not a shell but something condensed from pure elemental energy.
